snippet.title: Observation of a new particle in the search for the Standard Model Higgs boson with the ATLAS detector at the LHC
snippet.description:
* Observation of a new particle in the search for the Standard Model Higgs boson with the ATLAS detector at the LHC
Georges Aad, Tatevik Abajyan, Brad Abbott, Jalal Abdallah, Samah Abdel Khalek, Ahmed Ali Abdelalim, Ovsat Abdinov, Rosemarie Aben, Babak Abi, Maris Abolins, Ossama AbouZeid, Halina Abramowiczhttp://academic.research.microsoft.com/io.ashx?type=5&id=58614433&selfId1=-1&selfId2=-1&maxNumber=12&query=price gibson howard roberts custom
A search for the Standard Model Higgs boson in proton-proton collisions with the ATLAS detector at the LHC is presented. The datasets used correspond to integrated luminosities of approximately 4.8 fb$^{-1}$ collected at $\sqrt{s}$ = 7 TeV in 2011 and 5.8 fb$^{-1}$ at $\sqrt{s}$ = 8 TeV in 2012. Individual searches in the channels $H \\...
Published in 2012.

snippet.title: Search for diphoton events with large missing transverse momentum in 7 TeV proton-proton collision data with the ATLAS detector
snippet.description:
* Search for diphoton events with large missing transverse momentum in 7 TeV proton-proton collision data with the ATLAS detector
Georges Aad, Tatevik Abajyan, Brad Abbott, Jalal Abdallah, Samah Abdel Khalek, Ahmed Ali Abdelalim, Ovsat Abdinov, Rosemarie Aben, Babak Abi, Maris Abolins, Ossama AbouZeid, Halina Abramowiczhttp://academic.research.microsoft.com/io.ashx?type=5&id=58614584&selfId1=-1&selfId2=-1&maxNumber=12&query=price gibson howard roberts custom
A search for diphoton events with large missing transverse momentum has been performed using proton-proton collision data at $\sqrt{s}$ = 7 TeV recorded with the ATLAS detector, corresponding to an integrated luminosity of 4.8 fb$^{-1}$. No excess of events was observed above the Standard Model prediction and model-dependent 95% confidence level exclusion limits are set. In ...
Journal: Physics Letters B - PHYS LETT B , vol. 710, no. 4-5, pp. 519-537, 2012

snippet.title: Search for a supersymmetric partner to the top quark in final states with jets and missing transverse momentum at $\sqrt{s}$ = 7 TeV with the ATLAS detector
snippet.description:
* Search for a supersymmetric partner to the top quark in final states with jets and missing transverse momentum at $\sqrt{s}$ = 7 TeV with the ATLAS detector
Georges Aad, Tatevik Abajyan, Brad Abbott, Jalal Abdallah, Samah Abdel Khalek, Ahmed Ali Abdelalim, Ovsat Abdinov, Rosemarie Aben, Babak Abi, Maris Abolins, Ossama AbouZeid, Halina Abramowiczhttp://academic.research.microsoft.com/io.ashx?type=5&id=58614462&selfId1=-1&selfId2=-1&maxNumber=12&query=price gibson howard roberts custom
A search for direct pair production of supersymmetric top squarks (stop_1) is presented, assuming the stop_1 decays into a top quark and the lightest supersymmetric particle, neutralino_1, and that both top quarks decay to purely hadronic final states. A total of 16 (4) events are observed compared to a predicted Standard Model background of $13.5^{+3....
Published in 2012.

snippet.title: A search for $t\bar{t}$ resonances in lepton+jets events with highly boosted top quarks collected in $pp$ collisions at $\sqrt{s}$ = 7 TeV with the ATLAS detector
snippet.description:
* A search for $t\bar{t}$ resonances in lepton+jets events with highly boosted top quarks collected in $pp$ collisions at $\sqrt{s}$ = 7 TeV with the ATLAS detector
Georges Aad, Tatevik Abajyan, Brad Abbott, Jalal Abdallah, Samah Abdel Khalek, Ahmed Ali Abdelalim, Ovsat Abdinov, Rosemarie Aben, Babak Abi, Maris Abolins, Ossama AbouZeid, Halina Abramowiczhttp://academic.research.microsoft.com/io.ashx?type=5&id=58614280&selfId1=-1&selfId2=-1&maxNumber=12&query=price gibson howard roberts custom
A search for resonant production of high-mass top-quark pairs is performed on 2.05 fb$^{-1}$ of proton-proton collisions at $\sqrt{s}$ = 7 TeV collected in 2011 with the ATLAS experiment at the Large Hadron Collider. This analysis of the lepton+jets final state is specifically designed for the particular topology that arises from the decay of highly ...
Published in 2012.

snippet.title: Search for the Standard Model Higgs boson produced in association with a vector boson and decaying to a b-quark pair with the ATLAS detector
snippet.description:
* Search for the Standard Model Higgs boson produced in association with a vector boson and decaying to a b-quark pair with the ATLAS detector
Georges Aad, Brad Abbott, Jalal Abdallah, Samah Abdel Khalek, Ahmed Ali Abdelalim, Ovsat Abdinov, Babak Abi, Maris Abolins, Ossama AbouZeid, Halina Abramowicz, Henso Abreu, Emilio Acerbihttp://academic.research.microsoft.com/io.ashx?type=5&id=58614200&selfId1=-1&selfId2=-1&maxNumber=12&query=price gibson howard roberts custom
This Letter presents the results of a direct search with the ATLAS detector at the LHC for a Standard Model Higgs boson of mass $110 \le m_H \le 130$ GeV produced in association with a W or Z boson and decaying to $b\bar{b}$. Three decay channels are considered: $ZH \to l^+ l^- b\bar{b}, WH \\...
Published in 2012.

snippet.title: Search for Down-Type Fourth Generation Quarks with the ATLAS Detector in Events with One Lepton and Hadronically Decaying W Bosons
snippet.description:
* Search for Down-Type Fourth Generation Quarks with the ATLAS Detector in Events with One Lepton and Hadronically Decaying W Bosons
Georges Aad, Brad Abbott, Jalal Abdallah, Ahmed Ali Abdelalim, Abdelouahab Abdesselam, Ovsat Abdinov, Babak Abi, Maris Abolins, Ossama AbouZeid, Halina Abramowicz, Henso Abreu, Emilio Acerbihttp://academic.research.microsoft.com/io.ashx?type=5&id=58613665&selfId1=-1&selfId2=-1&maxNumber=12&query=price gibson howard roberts custom
This Letter presents a search for pair production of heavy down-type quarks decaying via $b' \to Wt$ in the lepton + jets channel, as $b'b' \to W^-tW^+\overline{t} \to b\overline{b}W^+W^-W^+W^- \to l^{+-}\nu b\overline{b}q\overline{q}q\overline{q}q\overline{q}$. In addition to ...
Published in 2012.

snippet.title: Search for Pair Production of a Heavy Up-Type Quark Decaying to a W Boson and a b Quark in the lepton+jets Channel with the ATLAS Detector
snippet.description:
* Search for Pair Production of a Heavy Up-Type Quark Decaying to a W Boson and a b Quark in the lepton+jets Channel with the ATLAS Detector
Georges Aad, Brad Abbott, Jalal Abdallah, Ahmed Ali Abdelalim, Abdelouahab Abdesselam, Ovsat Abdinov, Babak Abi, Maris Abolins, Ossama AbouZeid, Halina Abramowicz, Henso Abreu, Emilio Acerbihttp://academic.research.microsoft.com/io.ashx?type=5&id=58613590&selfId1=-1&selfId2=-1&maxNumber=12&query=price gibson howard roberts custom
A search is presented for production of a heavy up-type quark (t') together with its antiparticle, assuming subsequent decay to a W boson and a b quark, t't'bar -> W+b W-bbar. The search is based on 1.04 fb^-1 of proton-proton collisions at sqrt(s) = 7 TeV collected by the ATLAS detector at the ...
Published in 2012.

snippet.title: Search for pair production of a new quark that decays to a Z boson and a bottom quark with the ATLAS detector
snippet.description:
* Search for pair production of a new quark that decays to a Z boson and a bottom quark with the ATLAS detector
Georges Aad, Brad Abbott, Jalal Abdallah, Samah Abdel Khalek, Ahmed Ali Abdelalim, Abdelouahab Abdesselam, Ovsat Abdinov, Babak Abi, Maris Abolins, Ossama AbouZeid, Halina Abramowicz, Henso Abreuhttp://academic.research.microsoft.com/io.ashx?type=5&id=58613779&selfId1=-1&selfId2=-1&maxNumber=12&query=price gibson howard roberts custom
A search is reported for the pair production of a new quark, b', with at least one b' decaying to a Z boson and a bottom quark. The data, corresponding to 2.0 fb$^{-1}$ of integrated luminosity, were collected from pp collisions at $\sqrt{s}$ = 7 TeV with the ATLAS detector at the CERN Large Hadron Collider. Using events ...
Published in 2012.

snippet.title: Measurement of the top quark pair cross section with ATLAS in pp collisions at sqrt(s) = 7 TeV using final states with an electron or a muon and a hadronically decaying tau lepton
snippet.description:
* Measurement of the top quark pair cross section with ATLAS in pp collisions at sqrt(s) = 7 TeV using final states with an electron or a muon and a hadronically decaying tau lepton
Georges Aad, Brad Abbott, Jalal Abdallah, Samah Abdel Khalek, Ahmed Ali Abdelalim, Ovsat Abdinov, Babak Abi, Maris Abolins, Ossama AbouZeid, Halina Abramowicz, Henso Abreu, Emilio Acerbihttp://academic.research.microsoft.com/io.ashx?type=5&id=58613959&selfId1=-1&selfId2=-1&maxNumber=12&query=price gibson howard roberts custom
A measurement of the cross section of top quark pair production in proton-proton collisions recorded with the ATLAS detector at the LHC at a centre-of-mass energy of 7 TeV is reported. The data sample used corresponds to an integrated luminosity of 2.05 fb^-1. Events with an isolated electron or muon and a tau lepton decaying ...
Published in 2012.

snippet.title: Search for a fermiophobic Higgs boson in the diphoton decay channel with the ATLAS detector
snippet.description:
* Search for a fermiophobic Higgs boson in the diphoton decay channel with the ATLAS detector
Georges Aad, Brad Abbott, Jalal Abdallah, Samah Abdel Khalek, Ahmed Ali Abdelalim, Ovsat Abdinov, Babak Abi, Maris Abolins, Ossama AbouZeid, Halina Abramowicz, Henso Abreu, Emilio Acerbihttp://academic.research.microsoft.com/io.ashx?type=5&id=58613756&selfId1=-1&selfId2=-1&maxNumber=12&query=price gibson howard roberts custom
A search for a fermiophobic Higgs boson with diphoton events produced in proton-proton collisions at a centre-of-mass energy of sqrt(s) = 7 TeV is performed using data corresponding to an integrated luminosity of 4.9 fb-1 collected by the ATLAS experiment. A specic benchmark model is considered where all the fermion couplings to the Higgs boson ...
Published in 2012.
